Notifications To avoid missing any relevant news, you decide to add a feature to warn you when a new article is published, according to criteria that you have predefined. To do this, you decide to add a new settings screen, accessible from the menu point of the main screen of the application.\n

If notifications are enabled, then the app will check once a day if news matches the search criteria, then notify you with a notification message. In the menu at the top left, you can choose the categories that interest you. Once a category is selected, the items are displayed.
